https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Administrator class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Administrator - the person/organisation appointed as administrator

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Director class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Director - someone who controls resources and expenditures

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Employment
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: Position held within an organisation - an employment can encompass one or more roles

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Insolvency Practitioner
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: A person who is a registered Insolvency Practitioner this is different to a role in the fact that a persons role changes according to their employment whereas an IP is a registered appointment that a person takes with them through whatever roles they are employed in

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Liquidator class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Liquidator - the person/organisation appointed as Liquidator

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Member class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Member of Staff

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Petitioner class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Petitioner - the person/organisation appointed as Petitioner

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Position class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: responsibility in business or other enterprise

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Receiver class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Receiver - this can either be a person appointed as a receiver within an organisation or an individual office of the official receiver

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Role class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment:
A position involving a specific activity that is held either by a person or organisation
		eg a role can be a person who is a solicitor within an organisation
			or a role of solicitor can be provided by an organisation without reference to a particular person

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: Solicitor class
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role of a Solicitor - the person/organisation appointed as Solicitor

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: hasPrincipalTradingAddress property
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: Principal Trading Address associated with a person

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: role assigned to an employment

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: employedAs property
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: The role associated with an employment

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.label: hasAddress
https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: Current or last registered address for a person

https://www.thegazette.co.uk/def/person#.comment: Employment that is held at specific location

Registered address that a person had in the past - this usually represents a move
